scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one autograph legal document, an article of agreement, February 20, 1830, between Archibald A. Hall of Augusta County, Virginia, and William D. Jones of Buckingham County, Virginia. Hall promises to deliver one load of good whiskey at Jones' Store in Buckingham County.
